parameters.name: grantType
parameters.description: The type of the authorization grant (password, refresh_token, client_credentials, authorization_code)

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username/email of the user to be authenticated. Required if grant_type='password'

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password of the user to be authenticated. Required if grant_type='password'

parameters.name: refreshToken
parameters.description: The refresh token instead of username/password. Required if grant_type='refresh_token'

parameters.name: redirectUri
parameters.description: The redirect uri if grant type='authorization_code'

get.summary: Get a list of all participants
get.description: Retrieves a list of all defined participants.

get.summary: Get a tree of categories that have available events
get.description: Retrieves a tree containing the currently active sport hierarchy. From top to bottom: Sport(e.g. Football), Category(e.g. England), Tournament(e.g. Premier League). <a target='_blank' href='/swagger/examples/sportsbook-categories-available.json'>Click here to see a sample response.</a>

get.summary: Get the version of each available event
get.description: Retrieves a list containing a summary of all sportsbook events that are available for betting. <a target='_blank' href='/swagger/examples/sportsbook-event-versions.json'>Click here to see a sample response.</a>

parameters.name: includePrematch
parameters.description: Whether to include available prematch events. Default value true.

parameters.name: includeOutrights
parameters.description: Whether to include available outright events. Default value true.

parameters.name: includeInplay
parameters.description: Whether to include available inplay events. Default value true.

parameters.name: ignoreEventsWithNoMarkets
parameters.description: Whether to ignore events that have no available markets. Default value true.

get.summary: Get a tree of all categories
get.description: Retrieves a tree containing all the sport hierarchy. From top to bottom: Sport(e.g. Football), Category(e.g. England), Tournament(e.g. Premier League). <a target='_blank' href='/swagger/examples/sportsbook-categories-all.json'>Click here to see a sample response.</a>. The client can filter the response using the provided query parameters.

parameters.name: categoryType
parameters.description: The category type to include in the response. By default all types are returned.

get.summary: Get sportsbook configuration
get.description: Retrieves market type and market group configuration for all defined sports. <a target='_blank' href='/swagger/examples/sportsbook-config.json'>Click here to see a sample response.</a>

get.summary: Get an event by id
get.description: Retrieves a sportsbook event using the event id. <a target='_blank' href='/swagger/examples/sportsbook-event-by-id.json'>Click here to see a sample response.</a>

get.summary: Get available events and all their markets
Get available events and all their markets
Get a list of popular event selections
get.description: Retrieves a list containing the identifiers of the selections that are marked as popular on the betting provider.

get.summary: Get an event by id with all defined markets
get.description: Retrieves a sportsbook event containing all of its markets using the event id. Odds are not provided. <a target='_blank' href='/swagger/examples/sportsbook-event-by-id.json'>Click here to see a sample response.</a>

get.summary: Get an event by code
get.description: Retrieves a sportsbook event using the event code. <a target='_blank' href='/swagger/examples/sportsbook-event-by-id.json'>Click here to see a sample response.</a>

get.summary: Get a list of event Ids by participant Id
get.description: Retrieves a list of event Ids that the participant whose Id was given competes in

get.summary: Get a list of football events
get.description: Retrieves a list of football events for BOS

parameters.name: minTime
parameters.description: The minTime in timestamp eg 1517731596192. If not set defaults to NOW

get.summary: Get all available inplay events
get.description: Retrieves a list containing all sportsbook events that are available for in play betting.

get.summary: Get a participant for a sport by id
get.description: Retrieves a participant for a sport by id.

get.summary: Get a tree of categories that have resulted events
Get a page of resulted events of a sport

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: Date from filter for event date in yyyy-mm-dd format

get.summary: Get a list of resulted events by ids
Get a list of participants for a sport
get.description: Retrieves a list of defined participants for a sport. Additional filtering by tournament id is possible.

get.summary: Get a list of events that match the search term
get.description: Retrieves a list sportsbook events based on the search term and optional filtering and paging parameters

parameters.name: onlyIds
parameters.description: True if only event Ids should be returned. Default to false

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Normal filter parameter, e.g. can filter based on siteId (probably not relevant)

get.summary: Get list of popular events
Returns the full details for a specific bet id
get.description: Returns the full bet info

parameters.name: betId
parameters.description: The bet IDs that the player ask for

parameters.name: includeEventResults
parameters.description: If the event result have to be returned

parameters.name: includeChildBetSummaries
parameters.description: If the child bet summaries have to be returned

parameters.name: excludePartialCashOutBet
parameters.description: True: Exclude all the bets that are created through a partial cash out. False: Include them

get.summary: Returns the full details for a specific betSlipId
get.description: Returns the full bet info

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: The betSlipId or betId that the client asked for

parameters.name: isBetId
parameters.description: If uid provided is a betId this must be true. If false uid is considered betSlipId

parameters.name: includeEventResults
parameters.description: If the event result have to be returned

parameters.name: includeChildBetSummaries
parameters.description: If the child bet summaries have to be returned

parameters.name: excludePartialCashOutBet
parameters.description: True: Exclude all the bets that are created through a partial cash out. False: Include them

get.summary: Returns the details for a specific bet id
get.description: Returns the bet info

parameters.name: betId
parameters.description: The bet IDs that the player ask for

parameters.name: includeEventResults
parameters.description: If the event result have to be returned

parameters.name: includeChildBetSummaries
parameters.description: If the child bet summaries have to be returned

parameters.name: excludePartialCashOutBet
parameters.description: True: Exclude all the bets that are created through a partial cash out. False: Include them

get.summary: Returns the details for a specific betslip id
get.description: Returns the betslip info

parameters.name: betslipId
parameters.description: The betslip ID that the player ask for

parameters.name: includeEventResults
parameters.description: If the event result have to be returned

parameters.name: includeChildBetSummaries
parameters.description: If the child bet summaries have to be returned

parameters.name: excludePartialCashOutBet
parameters.description: True: Exclude all the bets that are created through a partial cash out. False: Include them

get.summary: Calculates build bet price.

parameters.name: selectionIds
parameters.description: A comma separated list of selection ids

delete.description: Used by terminals to cancel a betslip

get.summary: Retrieves a stored betslip
get.description: Player can use the template id provided during a betslip verification in order to retrieve the betslip details and place the wager in retail shop.

parameters.name: templateId
parameters.description: The template id. This is the mnemonic code of the stored betslip.

post.description: When a Sportsbook customer has loaded the betslip with one or more selections and clicks to submit their bets, the Sportsbook front end client sends a placeBets API call to the server. Click to see a Sample <a target='_blank' href='/swagger/examples/wager-wagerRequest.json'> request </a> or <a target='_blank' href='/swagger/examples/wager-wagerResponse.json'> response.</a>

parameters.name: extendedResponse
parameters.description: If true selections/markets/events descriptions & events kickoff time will be returned

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The place bet request domain object

delete.description: Used to rollback a betslip in case of timeout or of error after the betslip submission.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The undo bet request domain object

delete.summary: Rollback a paid or canceled betslip
delete.description: Used by terminals to rollback the cancellation or payment of a betslip

parameters.name: transactionId
parameters.description: The transaction id used in pay or cancel

put.description: Used by terminals to settle a betslip

post.description: When a Sportsbook customer has loaded the betslip with one or more selections and clicks to submit their bets, the Sportsbook front end client sends a placeBets API call to the server. Click to see a Sample <a target='_blank' href='/swagger/examples/wager-verifyRequest.json'> request </a> or <a target='_blank' href='/swagger/examples/wager-verifyResponse.json'> response.</a>

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The place bet request domain object

500.description: Internal Server Error  | Error code | Description |  | :-: | - |  | 1108 |  Player id required    | 1109 |  Game-draw-wager required    | 1110 |  Prizes required    | 1111 |  Payment already processed    | 2001 |   Invalid input    | 2002 |  Game not found    | 2003 |  Invalid draw id    | 2004 |  Transaction Failed    | 2005 |  Wager not found    | 2006 |  Draw not found    | 2007 |  No results found    | 2008 |  Unknown verification error    | 2009 |  Technical    | 2010 |  Bad request    | 2011 |  Not found    | 2012 |  Timeout

put.summary: Calls the PAM to settle a wager
put.description: <h4><span data-sw-translate=\"\">Implementation Notes</span></h4><div class=\"markdown\"><p>This method is used for auto-pay and settles the wager in the PAM (internal API).</p>  </div>

500.description: Internal Server Error  | Error code | Description |  | :-: | - |  | 1108 |  Player id required    | 1109 |  Game-draw-wager required    | 1110 |  Prizes required    | 1111 |  Payment already processed    | 2001 |   Invalid input    | 2002 |  Game not found    | 2003 |  Invalid draw id    | 2004 |  Transaction Failed    | 2005 |  Wager not found    | 2006 |  Draw not found    | 2007 |  No results found    | 2008 |  Unknown verification error    | 2009 |  Technical    | 2010 |  Bad request    | 2011 |  Not found    | 2012 |  Timeout
